camel.sink.endpoint.block.name: camel.sink.endpoint.block
camel.sink.endpoint.block.description: If sending a message to a direct endpoint which has no active consumer, then we can tell the producer to block and wait for the consumer to become active.

camel.sink.endpoint.failIfNoConsumers.name: camel.sink.endpoint.failIfNoConsumers
camel.sink.endpoint.failIfNoConsumers.description: Whether the producer should fail by throwing an exception, when sending to a Direct-VM endpoint with no active consumers.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.timeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.timeout
camel.sink.endpoint.timeout.description: The timeout value to use if block is enabled.

camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy.name: camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy
camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy.description: Sets a HeaderFilterStrategy that will only be applied on producer endpoints (on both directions: request and response). Default value: none.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.propagateProperties.name: camel.sink.endpoint.propagateProperties
camel.sink.endpoint.propagateProperties.description: Whether to propagate or not properties from the producer side to the consumer side, and vice versa. Default value: true.

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.direct-vm.block.name: camel.component.direct-vm.block
camel.component.direct-vm.block.description: If sending a message to a direct endpoint which has no active consumer, then we can tell the producer to block and wait for the consumer to become active.

camel.component.direct-vm.lazyStartProdu.name: camel.component.direct-vm.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.direct-vm.lazyStartProdu.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.direct-vm.timeout.name: camel.component.direct-vm.timeout
camel.component.direct-vm.timeout.description: The timeout value to use if block is enabled.

camel.component.direct-vm.basicPropertyB.name: camel.component.direct-vm.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.direct-vm.basicPropertyB.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.direct-vm.headerFilterSt.name: camel.component.direct-vm.headerFilterStrategy
camel.component.direct-vm.headerFilterSt.description: Sets a HeaderFilterStrategy that will only be applied on producer endpoints (on both directions: request and response). Default value: none.

camel.component.direct-vm.propagatePrope.name: camel.component.direct-vm.propagateProperties
camel.component.direct-vm.propagatePrope.description: Whether to propagate or not properties from the producer side to the consumer side, and vice versa. Default value: true.
